abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "TaxonKey" : [ "is Lepus capensis Linnaeus, 1758" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from ISU Mammals 1 records from UWBM Mammalogy Collection (Arctos) 1 records from Mammals Specimens 1 records from CNMA/Colección Nacional de mamíferos 1 records from Great Eastern Ranges - Slopes to Summit 1 records from Marsabit Ecosystem Inventory Surveys 2014 1 records from Geographically tagged INSDC sequences 1 records from MSB Mammal Collection (Arctos) 1 records from NatureShare 1 records from Mt. Kenya Inventory Surveys 2009 1 records from Mammal osteology MZS 1 records from UAM Mammal Collection (Arctos) 1 records from Museums Victoria provider for OZCAM 1 records from HSU Wildlife Mammals 1 records from Lund Museum of Zoology (MZLU) 1 records from CHAS Mammalogy Collection (Arctos) 1 records from Tasmanian Museum and Art Gallery provider for OZCAM 1 records from HSU Vertebrate Museum Mammals Collection 1 records from Vertebrats d'Andorra 1 records from MfN - Fossil vertebrates IV 1 records from EDIT - ATBI in Spreewald (Germany) 2 records from Mammifères (sauf Chiroptères) du Muséum d'Histoire Naturelle de la ville de Bourges (BOUM) 2 records from Collections and observation data National Museum of Natural History Luxembourg 2 records from Occurrence records of mammal species in Tana River Basin, Kenya 2 records from Palaeobiology - Vertebrate Fossils Collection - Mammalia - Royal Ontario Museum 2 records from List of animalia, fungi and plant species recorded through naturalist observations and research activities in Benin. Data mobilized in the framework of a JRS Biodiversity Foundation project of Benin 2 records from Cowan Tetrapod Collection - Mammals 2 records from Rapid Assessment Program (RAP) Biodiversity Survey Database 2 records from University of California Museum of Paleontology 2 records from Census of the animals of Benin 2 records from SysTax - Zoological Collections 3 records from NYSM Mammals 3 records from LSUMZ Mammals Collection 3 records from Colección Mastozoológica del IADIZA - CCT CONICET Mendoza: IADIZA-CMI 3 records from ZUEC-MAM - Coleção de Mamíferos do Museu de Zoologia da UNICAMP 3 records from Vertebrate collections of the Department of Animal Biology and Conservation Sciences, University of Ghana 3 records from Mammals housed at MHNG, Geneva 4 records from TTU Mammals Collection 4 records from MVZ Mammal Collection (Arctos) 4 records from Museu de Ciències Naturals de Barcelona: MCNB-Tissue 5 records from Making the zoology collection at the Natural History Museum of Zimbabwe accessible through GBIF by end of 2017 (BID-AF2015-0117-SMA) 5 records from Occurrence records of small and medium sized mammal species in Tana River Basin, Kenya 5 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Museum collection digitized at storage unit level 6 records from NHMO Mammal collection 6 records from University of Michigan Museum of Zoology, Division of Mammals 7 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Mammalia 7 records from CUMV Mammal Collection 9 records from Queen Victoria Museum Art Gallery provider for OZCAM 10 records from Australian National Wildlife Collection provider for OZCAM 10 records from KUBI Mammalogy Collection 10 records from Museo Argentino de Ciencias Naturales "Bernardino Rivadavia" (MACN). Mammalogy National Collection (MACNMa) 10 records from Northern Territory Museum and Art Gallery provider for OZCAM 12 records from MSU Mammalogy, Ornithology and Vertebrate Paleontology Collections 14 records from Mammalogy Collection - Royal Ontario Museum 14 records from Mammalia Collection of Institute of Systematics and Evolution of Animals 14 records from Museum of Comparative Zoology, Harvard University 15 records from National System of Protected Areas in Poland - Animals 16 records from RBINS DaRWIN 16 records from Queensland Museum provider for OZCAM 18 records from Vertebrate Zoology Division - Mammalogy, Yale Peabody Museum 18 records from Vertebrates of the Gothenburg Natural History Museum (GNM) 19 records from BioGIS - Mammals - SPNI 20 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 23 records from Canberra Nature Map 24 records from Australian Museum provider for OZCAM 27 records from IICT Colecção Zoológica 27 records from Questagame weekly feed 30 records from Brisbane City Council 31 records from naturgucker 36 records from ALA species sightings and OzAtlas 36 records from Museu de Ciències Naturals de Barcelona: MCNB-Cord 38 records from South Australian Museum Australia provider for OZCAM 39 records from Collection Mammalia SMF 41 records from Paleobiology Database 44 records from CAS Mammalogy (MAM) 47 records from LACM Vertebrate Collection 54 records from ACT Wildlife Atlas 66 records from Large mammals in Israel from camera traps 70 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations 80 records from BioGIS -
